channel.title: I have JDK 6 update 7 i need classpath and path code!
channel.description: whats the path and clathpath code for my compiler?? i forgot

item.title: I have JDK 6 update 7 i need classpath and path code!
item.dc:creator: @Skyline175 Skyline175
item.description:
@Skyline175 wrote:

Start Menu> (Right Click) My Computer > Properties

find the variable called “path” in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to “PATH” and then for it’s variable value
And add this

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdkx.x.x_xx\bin”

Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. add this in for it’s value:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdkx.x.x_xx\bin”

Where it says ‘jdkx.x.x_xx’ you must change the “x’s” to your jdk version.

Read full topic
item.source: I have JDK 6 update 7 i need classpath and path code!
